tool.name: Create Seurat object
tool.description: transforms an salmon alevin output or DGE matrix to a Seurat object v2.3.4

param.name: input_type
param.label: Select the format of your input:
param.help: Choose the input format of your data. This can be one of the following choices: Salmon alevin matrix, DGE (cells x genes).
param.option: DGE text file (Cells are columns, genes are rows)

tool.help:
Reads input file provided by user and creates a Seurat object from it.
Currently accepts the following inputs: * Salmon alevin matrix (.rds format) * DGE in text format (Cells are columns, genes are rows.
